item.title: Terms & Conditions
item.description:
1. General #

These Terms & Conditions (“Terms”) govern your purchase, subscription, and use of the products and services (“Services”) provided by Effortless (“we,” “us,” or “our”). By purchasing or using our Services, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, do not purchase or use the Services.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
<form
  action="https://formspree.io/f/xnnqygpj"
  method="POST"
>
  <label>
    Your email:
    <input type="email" name="email" />
  </label>

  <label>
    Your message:
    <textarea name="message"></textarea>
  </label>

  <button type="submit">Send</button>
</form>

<style>
    form {
        max-width: 400px;
        margin: 50px auto;
        padding: 20px;
        border: 1px solid #ddd;
        border-radius: 8px;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
      }
      
       
      label {
        display: block;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        font-weight: bold;
      }
      
       
      input[type="email"],
      textarea {
        width: 100%;
        padding: 10px;
        margin-top: 5px;
        border: 1px solid #ccc;
        border-radius: 4px;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        font-size: 14px;
        color: #0E172A;
      }
      
       
      input[type="email"]:focus,
      textarea:focus {
        border-color: #007BFF;
        outline: none;
        box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(0, 123, 255, 0.5);
      }
      
       
      textarea {
        resize: vertical;
        min-height: 300px;
      }
      
       
      button[type="submit"] {
        display: inline-block;
        width: 100%;
        padding: 10px;
        background-color: #2576BA;
        color: #fff;
        border: none;
        border-radius: 4px;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-weight: bold;
        cursor: pointer;
        text-align: center;
        transition: background-color 0.3s;
      }
      
      button:hover[type="submit"] {
        background-color: #0056b3;
      }
      
       
      @media (max-width: 480px) {
        form {
          padding: 15px;
        }
        button {
          font-size: 14px;
        }
      }
  </style>

item.description:

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Effortless (“we,” “our,” “us”) operates the website https://www.effortless.hu, and offers web services, desktop applications, and mobile applications that may interact with cloud services such as Google Cloud. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our services and products. By accessing or using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

item.title: Favorite Views
item.description: Mark your favorite views so you can access them at any time.

item.title: View Tracker
item.description: Keep track of all you recently open views.
